entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of thunderstorms. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 70 near thunderstorms early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near thunderstorms in the afternoon. High 24. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers late in the evening. Risk of thunderstorms early in the evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023
